languages.text: "Что ж, Лорд-капитан. Время мне вернуться к своим обязанностям. Могу ли я быть вам еще чем-то полезен?"
"Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"
languages.original_text: "Что ж, Лорд-капитан. Время мне вернуться к своим обязанностям. Могу ли я быть вам еще чем-то полезен?"

traits.locale_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «En fin, Lord Capitán, ya es hora de que retome mis obligaciones. ¿Hay algo más que pueda hacer por usted?».
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: «En fin, Lord Capitán, ya es hora de que retome mis obligaciones. ¿Hay algo más que pueda hacer por usted?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「それではロード・キャプテン、私はそろそろ仕事に戻ります。他にご用はございませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: 「それではロード・キャプテン、私はそろそろ仕事に戻ります。他にご用はございませんか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，舰长大人，我该回去履行我的职责了。我还能为您做些什么吗？”
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，舰长大人，我该回去履行我的职责了。我还能为您做些什么吗？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, il est temps pour moi de retourner à mes occupations. Puis-je faire autre chose pour vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: « Bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, il est temps pour moi de retourner à mes occupations. Puis-je faire autre chose pour vous ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, Lord Captain, es wird Zeit, dass ich mich wieder meinen Pflichten widme. Kann ich sonst noch etwas für Euch tun?"
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Lord Captain, es wird Zeit, dass ich mich wieder meinen Pflichten widme. Kann ich sonst noch etwas für Euch tun?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, vazife beni bekler. Yardımcı olabileceğim başka bir konu var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "Well, then, Lord Captain, it is time I returned to my duties. Is there anything else I can do for you?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, vazife beni bekler. Yardımcı olabileceğim başka bir konu var mıydı?"
